name: Afghanistan
interestingFact: since the use of the first flag in 1709, Afghanistan has had 26 different flags.

name: Albania
interestingFact: Albania is the world’s largest hydroelectricity producer. 100% of the country’s energy is hydroelectric.

name: Algeria
interestingFact: Algeria is the largest African nation, spread across more than 2 million square kilometres.

name: Andorra
interestingFact: the country of Andorra can fit into the City of London more than three times

name: Angola
interestingFact: Angola has a shortage of men, so common practice for a man is to have several wives.

name: Antigua
interestingFact: Antigua has no rivers and no lakes.

name: Argentina
interestingFact: Argentina government banned parents from naming their children after Messi, worrying about confusion later down the line if the name was to become too fashionable.

name: Australia
interestingFact: Indian Pacific train has the longest straight section of train track in the world

name: Austria
interestingFact: Vienna has the oldest zoo in the world which was founded in 1752.

name: Azerbaijan
interestingFact: Azerbaijan has the museum with the world’s largest collection of miniature books with more than 5,500 teeny tiny books on display.

name: India
interestingFact: Rajasthan has a Temple of Rats!

name: Poland
interestingFact:
Poland is home to the world’s biggest castle?
The Castle of the Teutonic Order in Malbork is the largest castle in the world by land area.
